text: adeuui han hyeongje hudeuleul sang-gihala geuneun gulgogjin molae eondeog-e geojuhaessdeon baegseong-ege gyeong-gohaessnola geuui ijeon-edo geuligo huedo geugos e gyeong-gojaneun iss-eossnola hananim oe e daleun geos-eul seomgiji malla sillo naneun widaehan eoneunal neohuiege iss neun eungbeol-i dulyeoul ppun-ila
